languages.text: "Я исполню приказ". {n}Соломон почтительно кивает, но вы успеваете заметить нотку печального разочарования в его глазах.{/n}
"I will obey the order." {n}Solomorne nods respectfully, but you catch a glimmer of sad disappointment in his eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я исполню приказ". {n}Соломон почтительно кивает, но вы успеваете заметить нотку печального разочарования в его глазах.{/n}

languages.text: 「ご命令に従います」{n}「ソロモーンは敬意を込めてうなずいたが、その瞳にはかすかに悲しげな失望の色が宿っていた」{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will obey the order." {n}Solomorne nods respectfully, but you catch a glimmer of sad disappointment in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ご命令に従います」{n}「ソロモーンは敬意を込めてうなずいたが、その瞳にはかすかに悲しげな失望の色が宿っていた」{/n}

languages.text: "Ich werde dem Befehl Folge leisten." {n}Solomorne nickt respektvoll, aber du registrierst einen Hauch betrübter Enttäuschung in seinen Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will obey the order." {n}Solomorne nods respectfully, but you catch a glimmer of sad disappointment in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde dem Befehl Folge leisten." {n}Solomorne nickt respektvoll, aber du registrierst einen Hauch betrübter Enttäuschung in seinen Augen.{/n}

languages.text: « À vos ordres. » {n}Solomorne incline la tête avec respect, mais vous décelez une lueur de tristesse et de déception dans son regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will obey the order." {n}Solomorne nods respectfully, but you catch a glimmer of sad disappointment in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres. » {n}Solomorne incline la tête avec respect, mais vous décelez une lueur de tristesse et de déception dans son regard.{/n}

languages.text: «Obedeceré la orden». {n}Solomorne asiente respetuosamente con la cabeza, pero adviertes un atisbo de tristeza y decepción en su mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will obey the order." {n}Solomorne nods respectfully, but you catch a glimmer of sad disappointment in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Obedeceré la orden». {n}Solomorne asiente respetuosamente con la cabeza, pero adviertes un atisbo de tristeza y decepción en su mirada.{/n}

languages.text: “我愿服从命令。”{n}索罗蒙充满敬意地点了点头，但你却在他的目光中看到了一丝悲伤、失望之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will obey the order." {n}Solomorne nods respectfully, but you catch a glimmer of sad disappointment in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我愿服从命令。”{n}索罗蒙充满敬意地点了点头，但你却在他的目光中看到了一丝悲伤、失望之意。{/n}

languages.text: "Emriniz başım üstüne." {n}Solomorne, hürmetle başını sallasa da bir an için bakışlarında hayal kırıklığı olduğunu seziyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will obey the order." {n}Solomorne nods respectfully, but you catch a glimmer of sad disappointment in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Emriniz başım üstüne." {n}Solomorne hürmetle başını sallar ancak bir anlığına bakışlarında bir hayal kırıklığı sezersin.{/n}
